description: Numbers n such that n divides the (right) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 3 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A029496 in that all least significant zeros are removed before concatenation.No more terms < 10^7. [Lars Blomberg, Oct 17 2011]
author: Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 24 2001
extensions: Edited and updated by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 12 2002
